articles.title: Yes, it’s true: Dunkin’ is selling iced coffee in 48-ounce buckets
articles.description:
The coffee buckets with handles are only available for a limited time and at limited Dunkin' locations only in New England.

The post Yes, it’s true: Dunkin’ is selling iced coffee in 48-ounce buckets appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Dunkin' introduces 48-ounce iced coffee buckets for a limited time in New England.
Available at select Dunkin' locations, promoting local coffee consumption.
Boston residents can enjoy larger iced coffee servings during warmer months.

articles.title: What Raiders GM John Spytek said about Maxx Crosby trade rumors
articles.description:
"We're in the business of having really good players on the team and we need a lot more of them."

The post What Raiders GM John Spytek said about Maxx Crosby trade rumors appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Raiders GM John Spytek emphasized the need for more talented players on the team.
Spytek's comments come amid ongoing trade rumors about defensive end Maxx Crosby.
Boston fans may see increased competition in the AFC if Crosby is traded.

articles.title: Platner maintains big lead over Mills in Maine senate race, new poll finds
articles.description:
Platner, a progressive upstart, has a 64% to 26% lead over Maine Gov. Janet Mills in the Democratic Senate primary, according to a new UNH poll.

The post Platner maintains big lead over Mills in Maine senate race, new poll finds appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Platner leads Mills 64% to 26% in Maine's Democratic Senate primary.
UNH poll indicates strong support for progressive candidates in New England.
Potential shift in regional politics could influence Boston's Democratic landscape.
